page.title: 05POST OFFICE - TILMANSTONE
page.content:
The{Post Office}in Tilmanstone is situated in the right-hand corner of the{village shop,}and consists of a small counter protected by a grille and reinforced armoured glass. It is classed as a{'sub-Post Office'}and provides a limited range of services.
Here one can:- buy postage{stamps;}post{letters and small{parcels;}pay{telephone accounts; buy a{television licence; receive retirement and Child Benefit{allowances. Giro {Bank}transactions are available. It is not able to:- issue{motor vehicle}licences; accept very large parcels and has no{Data Bank}facilities.
{Mail}is delivered twice a day with the exception of weekends.
